group_1.textRight: I think I did everything I could. What did@you think?

group_1.textLeft: It was way better than last time!

group_1.textRight: That's good... Maybe it's because I changed@my attitude.

group_1.textLeft: Anytime. What are you going to do now?
Nagitan, do you have a minute?

group_1.textRight: I believe I was able to replace the masters'@disappointment last time with enjoyment.
I'm very grateful you gave me another@chance.
I was able to make things right.
It wasn't about my satisfaction. I merely@fulfilled my duties.

group_1.textLeft: I was hoping you'd say you weren't satisfied.
Because I want you to continue being a maid.
The girls in the kitchen will be@disappointed, I'm sure...
But you learned something veeery important.
It'd be such a shame to let that go to@waste, honey.

group_1.textRight: I would like to keep being a maid.
The paycheck is important to me, but...
I want to use what I've learned.
If I can continue as a maid, I intend to@keep on improving.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:800700:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]I'm excited to see your unique maid style,@Nagitan!

group_1.textRight: I promise to exceed your expectations.
